fields.summary: Auto Scaling:  Add ability to specify more than one subnet per AZ in an ASG

fields.description: Eucalyptus requires AvailabilityZones for Autoscaling groups in CloudFormation and also kicks off rolling update if just the availability zone changes.  VPCZoneIdentifier changes or Launch Config changes are required at AWS.
fields.summary: AZ field no longer required on ASG for CF and Rolling updates should not kick off on just AZ change

comments.body: [~hspencer]The error message indicates that the autoscaling service still requires AZ as a field.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.0-0.25084.394.20160830git660153b.el7}}

Using attached template, the following error shows up in stack events output:
{code}
...
EVENT  	ELBASVPCStack  	e52d19c4-c64c-4545-8469-b40f3529af30   	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack     	ELBASVPCStack  	arn:aws:cloudformation::002598321247:stack/ELBASVPCStack/d093c482-8fa8-4946-a754-aba95ef0b22c     	2016-09-08T14:30:17.035Z       	ROLLBACK_IN_PROGRESS   	Create stack failed.  Rollback requested by user.
EVENT  	ELBASVPCStack  	50990242-0c27-4c8e-9578-47d38a254528   	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack     	ELBASVPCStack  	arn:aws:cloudformation::002598321247:stack/ELBASVPCStack/d093c482-8fa8-4946-a754-aba95ef0b22c     	2016-09-08T14:30:01.624Z       	CREATE_FAILED  	The following resource(s) failed to create: [AutoScalingGroup].
EVENT  	ELBASVPCStack  	AutoScalingGroup-CREATE_FAILED-1473345001021   	AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup     	AutoScalingGroup       		2016-09-08T14:30:01.021Z  	CREATE_FAILED  	AvailabilityZones.member.1 is required
EVENT  	ELBASVPCStack  	AutoScalingGroup-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1473345000655      	AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup     	AutoScalingGroup       		2016-09-08T14:30:00.655Z  	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
...
{code}

[~hspencer]  I have fixed the issue with the original template, which failed because of an issue that required ASGs to have AZs in the template for CF  (not true for ASG straight-up).  The other issue you mentioned, not allowing multiple subnets within an AZ is covered here: https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/browse/EUCA-12918  

However, neither test really addresses the issue, I think, which is that only changing the "AZ" field in an ASG should not kick off Rolling update (though it should kick off update).  I don't think you can just change AZs if you have VPCZoneIdentifier set because the subnets have to be within the zones mentioned in the AZs.  You need a template with an ASG with AZ's defined but not VPCZoneIdentifiers.  I've attached simple_template.json, I would test with multicluster and just change the value of the AZ in the template (from "one" to "two" in qa at least) and do an update.  It should update, but not kick off a "Rolling Update".

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.0-0.25788.147.20170202git6e5a63d.el7}}

*Steps*

# Create Eucalyptus VPC cloud with multiple availability zones - [hspencer-400-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/400/]:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones --region euca-admin@
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-dollar	available
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-market	available
AVAILABILITYZONE	port-of-miami	available
{code}
# Create non-eucalyptus account (example {{development-operations}})
# Bundle, upload and register Ubuntu Xenial EMI:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euca-describe-images --region devops-admin@
IMAGE	emi-63ef779d	ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-hvm-20170203/xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.manifest.xml	000727120439	available	public	x86_64	machine			instance-store	hvm
{code}
# Use linked {{cfn-asg-vpc-template.json}} template, and deploy an ASG stack:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euform-create-stack ASGTest --template-file cfn-asg-vpc-template.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter ImageId=emi-63ef779d --parameter KeyName=devops-admin --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --parameter MinSize=3 --parameter MaxSize=6 --region devops-admin@
[root@h-04 ~]# euform-describe-stacks ASGTest --region devops-admin@
STACK	ASGTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to deploy Auto Scaling Group on Eucalyptus VPC cloud	2017-02-10T16:53:39.924Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-63ef779d
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		3
PARAMETER	MaxSize		6
OUTPUT	AutoScalingGroup	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7

[root@h-04 ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups --region devops-admin@
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS	black-dollar		3	6	3	Default
INSTANCE	i-e65c07b7	black-dollar	InService	Healthy	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS
INSTANCE	i-198a63a4	black-dollar	InService	Healthy	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS
INSTANCE	i-171e5cf1	black-dollar	InService	Healthy	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	Name	ASGTest	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	AutoScalingGroup	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000727120439:stack/ASGTest/ded97807-0e89-4e0c-91f4-199935dcfda8	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	ASGTest	true
{code}
# Use linked {{cfn-asg-multiaz-vpc-template.json}} template, and update the stack:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euform-update-stack ASGTest --template-file cfn-asg-multiaz-vpc-template.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter ImageId=emi-63ef779d --parameter KeyName=devops-admin --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --parameter MinSize=3 --parameter MaxSize=6 --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000727120439:stack/ASGTest/ded97807-0e89-4e0c-91f4-199935dcfda8

[root@h-04 ~]# euform-describe-stacks ASGTest --region devops-admin@
STACK	ASGTest	UPDATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to deploy Auto Scaling Group in multiple AZs on Eucalyptus VPC cloud	2017-02-10T16:53:39.924Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-63ef779d
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		3
PARAMETER	MaxSize		6
OUTPUT	AutoScalingGroup	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7
{code}
# Confirm final ASG has an instance in each AZ:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups --region devops-admin@
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS	black-market,black-dollar,port-of-miami		3	6	3	Default
INSTANCE	i-e65c07b7	black-dollar	InService	Healthy	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS
INSTANCE	i-198a63a4	black-dollar	InService	Healthy	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS
INSTANCE	i-171e5cf1	black-dollar	InService	Healthy	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS
INSTANCE	i-c05d0be2	black-market	Pending	Healthy	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	Name	ASGTest	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	AutoScalingGroup	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000727120439:stack/ASGTest/ded97807-0e89-4e0c-91f4-199935dcfda8	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	ASGTest	true
[root@h-04 ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups --region devops-admin@
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS	black-market,black-dollar,port-of-miami		3	6	3	Default
INSTANCE	i-77f6ea49	port-of-miami	InService	Healthy	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS
INSTANCE	i-171e5cf1	black-dollar	InService	Healthy	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS
INSTANCE	i-c05d0be2	black-market	InService	Healthy	ASGTest-LaunchConfig-BLBRFSXUON3IS
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	Name	ASGTest	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	AutoScalingGroup	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::000727120439:stack/ASGTest/ded97807-0e89-4e0c-91f4-199935dcfda8	true
TAG	auto-scaling-group	ASGTest-AutoScalingGroup-U33TYZJBVPOD7	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	ASGTest	true
{code}
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
